issue.title: [Python] Expose integration test JSON read/write in Python API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2857](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2857). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should be clearly marked to not be used for persistence

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2857?focusedCommentId=16864069) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
More generally it would be useful to be able to drive integration tests from Python in-process rather than having to use subprocesses

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2857?focusedCommentId=17393020) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Other implementations will have to be invoked as subprocesses anyway, so I'm not sure this would be very useful.
